sentences.english: Treasure Island , which was written by Stevenson , is a popular book.
sentences.chinese: 《宝岛》是史蒂文森著的，是一本畅销书。

sentences.english: The  Olympics is just the  gateway to that island.
sentences.chinese: 而奥运会只是进入宝岛的大门。

sentences.english: We were told that we should sight the Treasure island that night.
sentences.chinese: 我们被告知那天夜里我们就要看见宝岛了。

sentences.english: Family fun in the pool, Treasure Island Resort, Treasure Island.
sentences.chinese: 珍宝岛酒店，泳池里的家庭欢乐时光。

definition: variant of 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]
Lüdao or Lutao township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan
Taidong or Taitung city and county in Taiwan
Pingtung city, county and military airbase in south Taiwan
Hengchun Peninsula in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], the southernmost point of Taiwan
Formosa (from Ilha Formosa, "Beautiful Isle", the name given to Taiwan Island by passing Portuguese mariners in 1544)
Jiayi or Chiayi city and county in west Taiwan
Lanyu or Orchid Island township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan
Kinmen or Quemoy islands off the Fujian coast, administered by Taiwan/Jinmen county in Quanzhou 泉州[Quan2 zhou1], Fujian, PRC
Hainan Island in South China Sea
Kinmen or Quemoy islands off the Fujian coast, administered by Taiwan
